oai_dc:dc.dc:title: MATRIX FORMULATION FOR INFINITE-RANK OPERATORS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: LIMAYE, BV
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: finite-rank operator
operator equation
eigenspace
spectral subspace
matrix formulation
STABILITY
EQUATIONS
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Every finite-rank operator on a linear space X is the composition of an operator from X to a finite dimensional Euclidean space and of an operator from that Euclidean space to X. We consider operators which are the sum of a finite-rank operator and another infinite-rank operator which satisfies an invariance condition with respect to one of the two 'components' of the finite-rank operator. A canonical procedure is given to reduce operator equations, eigenvalue problems and spectral subspace problems involving such operators to corresponding problems for finite matrices.
